A 5â€™ metal rod which provides offensive and defensive capabilities in melee.

  • Attacking: The rod attacks as a +2 magic item, doing [[/r 1d8]] damage.

  • Parrying: Instead of attacking, the character may use the rod to parry, gaining a +4 bonus to AC versus melee attacks for one round. It is not possible to parry with the rod when retreating from melee (see @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.u9gtXY21VnjrwwkH.JournalEntryPage.ouf3QNv4dWj0L1IW#movement]{Movement}).

  • No charges: Does not use charges; may be used an unlimited number of times.
